title: Bug 9619: Move static member - Dialog details
description:
Bug 9619: Move static member - Dialog details 20020212a.

Mnemonics
No validation on the type field. Type existence is not too expensive (done in the type wizard for the superclass), so it could be done. At least isValidTypeName.
Label could say 'Select destination type:'.
Browse button is too small (use SWTUtil for standard button sizes).
Title is used for long text. When going to the next page, it says 'Type not found'. Only types from the source folders of the own project should be shown in the dialog.
Destination type can be source type: refactoring warns that this will result in errors (which is not true) and makes pseudo changes in all referencing classes.
OB:
The browse button in the dialog is too small.
The title is used for long text.
When going to the next page, it displays 'Type not found'.
Types from source folders of the own project are not shown in the dialog.
Destination type being the same as the source type results in a warning and pseudo changes in all referencing classes.
